name: @spotify/ncs-parser
description: NoCopyrightSounds website parser to provide an API

scripts.build: tsc --module CommonJS --outDir dist/cjs && tsc --module ESNext --outDir dist/esm
scripts.buildWatch: tsc --watch --module CommonJS --outDir dist/cjs; tsc --watch --module ESNext --outDir dist/esm
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean; npm run build; npm run prettier

author: Lordpluha
